text: BA tells @riptari that customers can opt-out of tracking by disabling cookies. That's BS. 1) The leak of booking info is via URLs' query string, not cookies. 2) GDPR says people must be able to refuse consent without detriment; disabling cookies means you can't use their site. pic.twitter.com/kJpVVDAXYC

text: For avoidance of doubt, dodo is plural and is always to be served in multiples. There is nothing like dodo as in ONE, nor is there dodoes or dodos as in MANY. The latter would be tautological as in "many dodo" for example. Other similar phenoms are Gala, jollof and puff-puff.
